getDevice(devicesJson, type) { return devicesJson.find(el => el.type === type); } module.exports = a = async ({ params }) => { const deviceType = params.type const devicePlatform = params.platform let deviceTypes = [ { "type": "TOTP", "displayLabel": "Authenticator App" }, { "type": "PLATFORM-MAC", "displayLabel": "Mac Passkey" }, { "type": "PLATFORM-ANDROID", "displayLabel": "Android Passkey" }, { "type": "PLATFORM-IOS", "displayLabel": "iOS Passkey" }, { "type": "EMAIL", "displayLabel": "Email" }, { "type": "SMS", "displayLabel": "SMS" }, { "type": "VOICE", "displayLabel": "Voice" } ] let deviceLookupType = deviceType if (deviceType === "PLATFORM") { deviceLookupType = `${deviceType}-${devicePlatform}` } let deviceInfo = getDevice(deviceTypes, deviceLookupType) let deviceLabel = deviceInfo.displayLabel if (!deviceLabel) { deviceLabel = "Unknown Device" } return { 'deviceLabel': deviceLabel } }"},"nodeTitle":{"value":"Set Device Display
